channel.title: [317 PI - Will Rep!] Server Running Very strangely
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm running a 317 pi, and I was having a drop party with some of my members today - I dropped about 40 items, there were 15 people on at the time running around grabbing them, and we were experiencing some heavy lag, and after the heavy lag, a disconnect. This seems to happen often, and I'm not sure how to fix it. It never lagged on my old source, could anyone help please?

item.title: [317 PI - Will Rep!] Server Running Very strangely
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:6, topic:389363”][quote author=SGTCannon link=topic=485282.msg3555515#msg3555515 date=1301856839]
Hey,

I’m running a 317 pi, and I was having a drop party with some of my members today - I dropped about 40 items, there were 15 people on at the time running around grabbing them, and we were experiencing some heavy lag, and after the heavy lag, a disconnect. This seems to happen often, and I’m not sure how to fix it. It never lagged on my old source, could anyone help please?
[/quote]

Memory leak, add my msn; helpme@graduate.org
i can help you.[/quote]

Says I can’t add you on msn :s

Got another e-mail I can add?

Read full topic
